data.title: Excellent food and great service
data.text: Met friends to celebrate the birthday of one of them. The location had filled up for the lunch crowd and worried about getting a table since the restauarant had telephone problems that day which made a reservation impossible. After being seated almost immediately, we found the service to be excellent and the food outstanding. The atmosphere was nice and quiet, and we could have a great conversation.

data.title: If $$$ are not a problem
data.text:
The food generally is very good.  It would appear that everything is of top quality.
Their bread basket is probably one of the best, a great way to start of a meal. With a cocktail, appetizer and an entrée with a side the price for two diners will probably run about $150.00 before gratuity.

data.title: The top shelf restaurant of Boca.
data.text: Server Marnie was excellent with recommendations and wonderful service. We shared rib eyes, mashed potato, string beans and mushrooms.  Everything cooked to perfection! A "never disappoints" location. Check out the variable bread basket. Nice...

data.title: A hangout for the affluent, a disappointment for steak lovers
data.text:
We've been to Abe & Louie's in Boca Raton twice, and both experiences were "average".

The main dishes are a constant disappointment: Filet Mignon, New York Sirloin, Maine Lobster, etc. lack flavor and flair. 

The side dishes are a delight: Tuna Tartare, Brussels sprouts, Sweet potato fries, etc. Here's where you'll find the gusto in the food.

Ambiance: friendly environment, all patrons and employees seem to be having a great time, and staff is very attentive. Two specific experiences interacting with waiters: (1.) Filet Mignon was over cooked, they recognized it and brought me a new cut; (2.) We ordered Key Lime Pie for dessert, the waiter asked what we thought, we said it wasn't special - borderline ugly - and the waiter said he thought the same about it. At that point I asked why de didn't warn me beforehand, and he stayed mum about it and laughed it off. However, I was serious about the question.

data.title: Steak Tartar
data.text: Abe and Louis gets it right! Old world charm and delicious food! Make a reservation.  Great for date night.

data.title: Delicious
data.text:
Came here with a very large group and they did an incredible job.

I had fish and husband had a steak.  Both perfectly done.

data.title: best sword fish on the planet
data.text: Best Swordfish on the planet!!! Ask for Lew he is the best..he will take care of all your needs..everything here is great..but the swordfish chop, fillet, or steak is TO DIE FOR!!! Cant go wrong!

data.title: Date Night
data.text: Stopped in at about 8pm.  No reservation and the place was packed.  Saturday night and all - but we expected that.  The wait would have been and hour or more.  We wanted a spot at the BAR only and within five minutes had a great spot.  Ordered a some nice generous  cocktails from a very friendly bartender Anthony.   Then we had an appetizer or two or three and they were all very good.   We were going dancing and did not want to have a heavy  meal.   Then gone in about 90 minutes all in and a great place to do exactly as planned.  Would go back any time but would make a reservation if we wanted a full dinner.

data.title: Abe and Louie's, Boca Raton
data.text: The second you get there, from decor, to their service, to their staff, to the food, to the dessert, right out the door to the valet guys outside; Abe & Louie's (Boca Raton) is an outstanding dining experience. It's an old style steak house where everything was quite good. The portions are great, and the prices aren't too bad for a high end steak house either. I think it's a better option than Capital Grill, which is 2 minutes away. On the downside; no Heineken's, no Michelob Ultra, no the greatest wine list ever. No tragedy, but, that's the only complaint my group had. Appetizers/salads were excellent. Filet Mignon (on and off the bone) were terrific. Prime rib was very fatty, but, very flavorful. Also, the prime rib is off the bone (always better on the bone). Still, it's very good.

data.title: Didn't live up to my expectations
data.text: Highly acclaimed as one of the best restaurants in Boca Raton, I went out for a business lunch with a collegue. We easily found a parking space. The restaurant is beautiful and the hostess quick and professional. Our waiter was a bit odd, always interrupting, short and rather curt and on one occasion walked away while my host was in mid-sentence. The food was good, really very good, but overdone. A huge portion of wasabi mashed potatoes served as the base for seared, sesame ahi tuna. Tuna was excellent. On top was a delicious cold jimaca cole slaw with a wonderful dressing. Each component was excellent but together overwhelmed. Ended up as as a luke warm dish with the tuna ending up as the third place citizen.

data.title: Nice place
data.text: Good food. Typical steak place. Wine options could be better.  Parking is a challenge at times.  Nothing spectacular but you can't go wrong with a visit.

data.title: Delicious food, amazing service
data.text:
I absolutely love this restaurant.    The servers make you feel very special and well taken care of, without being overbearing and insincere.   The food comes out exactly as you ordered it, of highest quality, and prepared and presented just so.    Everything tastes really good.   The bar drinks are also crafted with outmost care and precision.   I had an old fashioned, I have never had a better one before or since.   I really like going for lunch there.    You get a mix of business and girly lunches.   The portions are smaller and the prices are less.   We usually order hamburgers, but this time I ordered filet mignon club sandwich.   The meat was very flavorful and tender.  It was a large portion.   I saw people getting salads and they looked very appetizing.  Overall, I highly recommend this restaurant way above Morton's and Ruth Chris.  I can't wait to go back.   
P.S.   They didn't pay me to write this review.

data.title: Great place for a wonderful meal
data.text:
I was invited to a 78th birthday party on a sunday night with 21 other people.We had a private glassed in room, nice for the group we were. Wait staff very attentive and service superb. The food from salad to fillet to cheesecake for dessert was was absolutely perfect. 
Can't say enough about how I enjoyed myself.
Great food relaxed service made for a wonderful time.

data.title: Diner with good friends
data.text: What can I say: 1/ waiter made some awesome recommendations Start with the crust bacon with Blue Cheese for the appitizer, each of us had for different main courses that were incredible. The deserts was to die for go for the chocolate cake it's heaven. finish with coffee or after diner drinks. and don't forget the wine with diner!

data.title: Awesome food
data.text: Went with a couple work colleges, the place is great , had the tomato caprice to start , the mozzarella was so delicious ! Entrees I had the ribeye was cooked to perfection , tasted so good too , had hash browns, cream spinach and a potato soufflé ! Can't wait to come back here ! The wine was really good too

data.title: Wow
data.text: Never disappoints!  Always consistent great service and food. Started with the blue point oysters. Big and fresh. Shrimp cocktail was great. Shared the lobster with breadcrumbs and this was amazing. Chunks of fresh lobster with a light sprinkle of breadcrumbs then baked. Served with drawn butter.  Also had the bone in rib eye. Always amazing.  Chocolate cake was delicious.

data.title: What a steak!
data.text: Great service from Armando and the what a great steak - the bone in filet. I'm amazed at the flavor with no sauce needed.  We also loved the creamed corn and the Boca chopped salad. Just a first class steakhouse. Best in South Florida.

data.title: Great bar and food
data.text: I love eating at the bar here. Great scene and great bartenders. The bartenders are very friendly and they pour a great drink. Love the Abe and Louis salad. Great shrimp cocktail.  I always have a great steak here. Nice ambiance at the bar. Can't wait to go back. Main dining is great to sit in as well I just prefer the bar area.

data.title: First Class
data.text:
We had dinner with our friends at the wonderful steak house......everything was top notch. The steaks were "cut it with a fork" tender and done to perfection along with the sides that were great. The waiter service has to be acknowledged for the excellent service. 
  This is a special occasion type of restaurant and will come back again.

data.title: Wonderful - but might lighten your wallet a bit
data.text: So - you go here BECAUSE you want to have the experience and the food.  You aren't coming to A&L because you want fast food and sloppy service.  The food is wonderful.  The service is superb.  It's where you go when you ant to impress the friends/clients/customers that you want to dine with.  Wine list is extensive - worth the trip!
